segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen; water everywhere from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's still running, and no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, and she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at those kids now, sneaking cookies from the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool; he's going to fall for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; the whole place could get ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, water damaging the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's nice, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're not paying attention to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and fix this right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
